short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quick navigation through comments on Habr.com

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
On the site habr.com, there are many comments in articles, and you want to read those that have the highest or lowest rating. When the page scrolls to the comments, the extension adds an additional popup with a list of comment ratings, which helps to quickly navigate through the comments by clicking on the corresponding rating.

You can also sort root comments by rating by clicking on the "Sort root comments" button
